Title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
Description: The game follows Link, who awakens from a hundred-year slumber to defeat Calamity Ganon and save the kingdom of Hyrule.

Title: Red Dead Redemption 2
Description: The game is set in an open world environment featuring a fictionalized version of the Western, Midwestern, and Southern United States in 1899, during the latter half of the Wild West era.

Title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
Description: Players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher, who sets out on a quest to find his missing adopted daughter and defeat the Wild Hunt.

Title: Fortnite
Description: Fortnite features a variety of game modes, including the battle royale mode, where up to 100 players fight to be the last person standing.
Console: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android

Title: Grand Theft Auto V
Description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective.
Console: PC, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One

Title: Minecraft
Description: Minecraft is a sandbox video game developed and published by Mojang Studios.
Console: PC, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android

Title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
Description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game.

Title: Among Us
Description: Among Us is an online multiplayer social deduction game developed and published by InnerSloth.

Title: Cyberpunk 2077
Description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing video game developed and published by CD Projekt.
Console: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Stadia

Title: Call of Duty: Warzone
Description: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale video game released as a part of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.
Console: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S

Title: Super Mario Odyssey
Description: Super Mario Odyssey is a platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch.

Title: League of Legends
Description: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games.
